title: Informal Workplace Learning Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Job-related fundamental language skills and intermediate domain expertise
context.additional_context: Designed for professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields to systematically acquire workplace informal learning strategies for language proficiency improvement. Features asynchronous learning environments using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners identify at least three language-based informal learning strategies that can be naturally applied when collaborating with colleagues/supervisors in a work environment.
Learners develop and implement a self-directed learning plan utilizing online information searches and peer feedback.
Learners write a report analyzing personal and organizational learning drivers that influence job performance.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
